title: Change the language filter.
body:
Instead of %'s it should be ♥'s
Thanks.

replies.body:
I can't believe you said something I can agree with.

%%%% you Sackboy.

And yes change the damn symbols for the language filter.

> I can't believe you said something I can agree with.
> 
> %%%% you Sackboy.
> 
> And yes change the damn symbols for the language filter.

Is my reputation now tarnished. :/
What a dumb ♥♥♥♥ing idea who the ♥♥♥♥ would want that ♥♥♥♥.
B-but if you do that we're copying the Steam/Valve forums. Maybe people will complain that Boards is the ugly child of both Reddit and Valve.

> [{quoted}](name=Rav,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Gmf5ABFv,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2014-12-07T14:40:48.793+0000)
>
> B-but if you do that we're copying the Steam/Valve forums. Maybe people will complain that Boards is the ugly child of both Reddit and Valve.
